rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肠道细菌可能掌握通用血液的关键，彻底改变输血医学研究发现，来自 Akkermansia muciniphila 的外切糖苷酶可有效靶向血型抗原，有可能将 A 和 B 血型转化为 ABO 通用血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/A-gut-bacteria-could-hold-the-key-to-universal-blood-revolutionizing-transfusion-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/A-gut-bacteria-could-hold-the-key-to-universal-blood-revolutionizing-transfusion-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=333ec0cb-8276-4810-b19c-6bf700eb8c74 Wed, 01 May 2024 22:22:00 -0400 A gut bacteria could hold the key to universal blood, revolutionizing transfusion medicine
确定用于预测 22q11.2 缺失综合征精神病风险的新生物标志物加州大学戴维斯分校健康中心研究人员最近领导的一项研究为与罕见遗传病 22q11.2 缺失综合征（或 22q）相关的分子变化提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/New-biomarkers-identified-for-predicting-psychosis-risk-in-22q112-deletion-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/New-biomarkers-identified-for-predicting-psychosis-risk-in-22q112-deletion-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7358a694-1fbb-457e-8bb9-930ddcaa9889 Wed, 01 May 2024 22:19:35 -0400 New biomarkers identified for predicting psychosis risk in 22q11.2 deletion syndrome
研究发现健康的生活方式可以抵消早逝的遗传风险研究发现，生活方式和遗传因素都会独立影响寿命，但健康的生活方式可以减少遗传因素对寿命缩短的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Healthy-lifestyle-may-offset-genic-risks-for-early-death-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Healthy-lifestyle-may-offset-genic-risks-for-early-death-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7e102e0-498e-4aad-be62-a3d444bde25c Wed, 01 May 2024 22:05:00 -0400 Healthy lifestyle may offset genetic risks for early death, study finds
研究揭示了无义介导的RNA衰变与小头畸形之间的分子机制无义介导的 RNA 降解 (NMD) 是一种进化上保守的分子机制，其中潜在缺陷的信使 RNA 或 mRNA（指导身体如何制造蛋白质的遗传物质）被降解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Study-uncovers-molecular-mechanism-linking-nonsense-mediad-RNA-decay-to-microcephaly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Study-uncovers-molecular-mechanism-linking-nonsense-mediad-RNA-decay-to-microcephaly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6864d7ba-6c54-425c-9d09-6fe14be40c20 Wed, 01 May 2024 22:00:32 -0400 Study uncovers molecular mechanism linking nonsense-mediated RNA decay to microcephaly
裸盖菇素被发现比对照组更有效治疗抑郁症状《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究表明，裸盖菇素（“神奇”蘑菇中的活性成分）比对照组更能有效治疗抑郁症状，进一步支持了其作为抗抑郁药的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Psilocybin-found-to-be-more-efficient-than-controls-for-treating-depression-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Psilocybin-found-to-be-more-efficient-than-controls-for-treating-depression-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59233082-ff36-4721-9f02-393db55f4409 Wed, 01 May 2024 21:52:38 -0400 Psilocybin found to be more effective than controls for treating depression symptoms
短暂的愤怒可能会对血管的放松能力产生负面影响根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项新研究，由记住过去的经历引发的短暂愤怒可能会对血管的放松能力产生负面影响，而血管的放松能力对于正常的血液流动至关重要。美国心脏协会审查杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Brief-episode-of-anger-may-negatively-impact-blood-vessels-ability-to-relax.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Brief-episode-of-anger-may-negatively-impact-blood-vessels-ability-to-relax.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4095fb1f-3990-4732-8283-6f901ae61b47 Wed, 01 May 2024 21:46:05 -0400 Brief episode of anger may negatively impact blood vessels' ability to relax
世卫组织推翻了关于空气传播疾病传播的教条。疾病预防控制中心可能不会对此采取行动。世界卫生组织发布了一份报告，改变了世界对 covid-19、流感和麻疹等呼吸道感染的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/WHO-overturns-dogma-on-airborne-disease-spread-The-CDC-might-not-act-on-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/WHO-overturns-dogma-on-airborne-disease-spread-The-CDC-might-not-act-on-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ade7300-9f91-49f9-a930-27dec5db6e27 Wed, 01 May 2024 21:32:47 -0400 WHO overturns dogma on airborne disease spread. The CDC might not act on it.
研究发现一种独特的蛋白质指纹与睡眠时间过短和糖尿病风险增加有关研究强调了睡眠持续时间与蛋白质组指纹之间的关联，发现睡眠时间过短与炎症和细胞死亡相关的蛋白质有关，这些蛋白质会增加患糖尿病 (DM) 的风险，但不会增加患冠心病 (CHD) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Research-identizes-a-unique- Protein-fingerprint-linked-to-very-short-sleep-and-increased-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Research-identizes-a-unique- Protein-fingerprint-linked-to-very-short-sleep-and-increased-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=587b769b-7fc6-4529-b602-54a8c170a0f9 Wed, 01 May 2024 19:59:00 -0400 Research identifies a unique protein fingerprint linked to very short sleep and increased diabetes risk
Bio-Rad 推出三种 StarBright 红色染料，并扩大了与 StarBright 紫罗兰染料结合的抗体标记物的范围，以增强免疫学研究https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Bio-Rad-launches-三-StarBright-Red-Dyes-and-expands-range-of-antibody-markers-conjuerated-to-StarBright-Violet-染料增强免疫学研究.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Bio-Rad-launches-三-StarBright-Red-Dyes-and-expands-range-of-antibody-markers-conjuerated-to-StarBright-Violet-染料增强免疫学研究.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8167cd7e-b1b3-4abd-ad2f-e8dfc22167c0 Wed, 01 May 2024 10:19:00 -0400 Bio-Rad launches three StarBright Red Dyes and expands range of antibody markers conjugated to StarBright Violet Dyes to enhance immunology research
Beckman Coulter Life Sciences 与 Watchmaker Genomics 合作提供 NGS 文库制备解决方案https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-and-Watchmaker-Genomics-Collaborate-to-Deliver-NGS-Library-Preparation-Solutions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240501/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-and-Watchmaker-Genomics-Collaborate-to-Deliver-NGS-Library-Preparation-Solutions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85a6b6b8-a86c-4e44-8b65-29df474966b9 Wed, 01 May 2024 09:22:00 -0400 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences and Watchmaker Genomics Collaborate to Deliver NGS Library Preparation Solutions
